price: 34. Mais ce jour-là, ce sera ceux qui ont cru qui riront des mécréants.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
